articles.title: Joshlin Smith's mother, Kelly, jailed for kidnapping and selling her in South Africa - BBC
articles.description: Joshlin Smith is yet to be found more than a year after she went missing from her home.
articles.content:
Khanyisile Ngcobo
A South African woman convicted of kidnapping and trafficking her six-year-old daughter has been sentenced to life in prison, along with her two accomplices.
The jail terms for Ra… [+4173 chars]
